org.apache.solr.cloud

Class OverseerCollectionMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.cloud.OverseerCollectionMessageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverseerMessageHandler

    public class OverseerCollectionMessageHandler
extends Object
implements OverseerMessageHandler
    A OverseerMessageHandler that handles Collections API related overseer messages.

      • crossCheckReplicaStateWithLiveNodes

        protected void crossCheckReplicaStateWithLiveNodes(List<String> liveNodes,
                                       NamedList<Object> collectionProps)
        Walks the tree of collection status to verify that any replicas not reporting a "down" status is on a live node, if any replicas reporting their status as "active" but the node is not live is marked as "down"; used by CLUSTERSTATUS.
        Parameters:
        liveNodes - List of currently live node names.
        collectionProps - Map of collection status information pulled directly from ZooKeeper.
